headline: Microchip Expands PolarFire® FPGA Smart Embedded Video Ecosystem with New SDI IP Cores and Quad CoaXPress™ Bridge Kit
summary: Solution stacks deliver broadcast-quality video, SLVS-EC to CoaXPress bridging and ultra-low power operation for next-generation medical, industrial and robotic vision applicationsCHANDLER, Ariz., Jan. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) has expanded its PolarFire® FPGA smart embedded video ecosystem to support developers who need reliable, low-power, high-bandwidth video connectivity. The embedded vision solution stacks combine hardware evaluation kits, development

headline: A Look At Microchip Technology (MCHP) Valuation After Positive Analyst Support And New Automotive And Aerospace Products
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) is back in focus after a wave of positive analyst commentary coincided with fresh product news in automotive embedded memory and aerospace grade transient voltage suppressors, giving investors new information to weigh. See our latest analysis for Microchip Technology. The recent stream of product announcements in aerospace grade protection devices and AI focused embedded controllers has arrived alongside building price momentum, with a 30 day share price return of...
